Articles.Content:
Hello

Where to place HyperEdit on a [0.20] KSP, i've tried on -SQUAD and on an another created directory, and it is not working

Best regards

Ben
in the plugins folder... where else would you put it

in the plugins folder... where else would you put it

in the [0.20] KSP there is no plugins folder !!!, where do i create this ?

Best Regards, Ben
Yes there is I'm looking at mine right now
Maybe he means 0.20.2?I still havent updated to it, maybe it has removed backwards compatibility?

Hadent thougth of that, might be

I'm still running 20.0.162.

i use 0.20.2.186

i tried to create a directory /Hyperdedit/plugins on squad root

i tried a new mods/Hyperedit/plugins on gamedata root

it still doesn't work, so what's up ?

Best regards, Ben
GameData/Hyperedit/Plugins...you could try, if nothing else, creating this KSP/Plugins(YOU make it,if there aint one)/and then you place the hyperedit.dll there
